content:
In this dataset, annotators are asked whether text is offensive. There are three possible labels: not offensive (0), maybe (1), offensive (2)

Human-rated Examples: (there may not be any)


Target Example:
Text: what did the black woman name her <number> sons ? tyrone , tyrone , tyrone , tyrone , and tyrone . how did she tell them apart ? she just called them by their last names .
Annotation from annotator:
The only valid output is a single integer.
